body_html:
@ezyang It's probably because we don't have execute permission set for the OS X and Windows scripts:

-rwxr-xr-x  1 willfeng  1876110778  1583 Jan 31 14:52 build.sh
-rw-r--r--  1 willfeng  1876110778   643 Jan 31 14:52 macos-build-test.sh
-rwxr-xr-x  1 willfeng  1876110778  2817 Jan 31 14:52 short-perf-test-cpu.sh
-rwxr-xr-x  1 willfeng  1876110778  4326 Jan 31 14:52 short-perf-test-gpu.sh
-rwxr-xr-x  1 willfeng  1876110778  1216 Jan 31 14:52 test.sh
-rw-r--r--  1 willfeng  1876110778  3009 Jan 31 14:52 win-build.sh
-rw-r--r--  1 willfeng  1876110778  2493 Jan 31 14:52 win-test.sh
body_text:
@ezyang It's probably because we don't have execute permission set for the OS X and Windows scripts:
-rwxr-xr-x  1 willfeng  1876110778  1583 Jan 31 14:52 build.sh
-rw-r--r--  1 willfeng  1876110778   643 Jan 31 14:52 macos-build-test.sh

body:
@ezyang It's probably because we don't have execute permission set for the OS X and Windows scripts: 

```
-rwxr-xr-x  1 willfeng  1876110778  1583 Jan 31 14:52 build.sh
-rw-r--r--  1 willfeng  1876110778   643 Jan 31 14:52 macos-build-test.sh
-rwxr-xr-x  1 willfeng  1876110778  2817 Jan 31 14:52 short-perf-test-cpu.sh
-rwxr-xr-x  1 willfeng  1876110778  4326 Jan 31 14:52 short-perf-test-gpu.sh
-rwxr-xr-x  1 willfeng  1876110778  1216 Jan 31 14:52 test.sh
-rw-r--r--  1 willfeng  1876110778  3009 Jan 31 14:52 win-build.sh
-rw-r--r--  1 willfeng  1876110778  2493 Jan 31 14:52 win-test.sh
```
